chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸 religiously ribbited at 10 PM. "Chirp! Medicine time!" Pip, a fluffy chick 🐥, usually obeyed. But tonight? Pizza! 🍕📺 Pip was engrossed. Ferdinand, impatient, hopped onto the TV screen. "RIBBIT! ⏰ MEDICINE!" Pip, startled, pecked the screen. Ferdinand landed *plop* in the pizza sauce. "Well," he sighed, covered in pepperoni, "at least it's not the taste." 🤣 Pip finally took the medicine, giggling.
